trans-unit.source: Language support (Azure Search Service REST API)
trans-unit.target: Language support (Azure Search Service REST API)

trans-unit.source: Searchable fields undergo analysis that most frequently involves word-breaking, text normalization, and filtering out terms.
trans-unit.target: Searchable fields undergo analysis that most frequently involves word-breaking, text normalization, and filtering out terms.

trans-unit.source: By default, searchable fields in Azure Search are analyzed with the <externalLink><linkText>Apache Lucene Standard analyzer (standard lucene)</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/index.html</linkUri></externalLink> which breaks text into elements following the <externalLink><linkText>"Unicode Text Segmentation"</linkText><linkUri>http://unicode.org/reports/tr29/</linkUri></externalLink> rules.
trans-unit.target: By default, searchable fields in Azure Search are analyzed with the <externalLink><linkText>Apache Lucene Standard analyzer (standard lucene)</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/index.html</linkUri></externalLink> which breaks text into elements following the <externalLink><linkText>"Unicode Text Segmentation"</linkText><linkUri>http://unicode.org/reports/tr29/</linkUri></externalLink> rules.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the standard analyzer converts all characters to their lower case form.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the standard analyzer converts all characters to their lower case form.

trans-unit.source: Both indexed documents and search terms go through the analysis during indexing and query processing.
trans-unit.target: Both indexed documents and search terms go through the analysis during indexing and query processing.

trans-unit.source: Azure Search provides the <externalLink><linkText>Lucene standard analyzer</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_2_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/standard/StandardAnalyzer.html</linkUri></externalLink>, and also allows indexing fields in a variety of languages.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search provides the <externalLink><linkText>Lucene standard analyzer</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_2_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/standard/StandardAnalyzer.html</linkUri></externalLink>, and also allows indexing fields in a variety of languages.

trans-unit.source: Each of those languages requires a non-standard text analyzer to account for characteristics of a given language.
trans-unit.target: Each of those languages requires a non-standard text analyzer to account for characteristics of a given language.

trans-unit.source: For example, the French analyzer applies a <externalLink><linkText>Light French Stemmer</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/fr/FrenchLightStemmer.html</linkUri></externalLink> to reduce words to their <externalLink><linkText>word stems</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stemming</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For example, the French analyzer applies a <externalLink><linkText>Light French Stemmer</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/fr/FrenchLightStemmer.html</linkUri></externalLink> to reduce words to their <externalLink><linkText>word stems</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stemming</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, it removes <externalLink><linkText>elisions</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elision</linkUri></externalLink> and French stop words from the analyzed text.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, it removes <externalLink><linkText>elisions</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elision</linkUri></externalLink> and French stop words from the analyzed text.

trans-unit.source: The analyzer for English extends the standard analyzer.
trans-unit.target: The analyzer for English extends the standard analyzer.

trans-unit.source: It removes possessives (trailing 's) from words, applies stemming as per <externalLink><linkText>Porter Stemming algorithm</linkText><linkUri>http://tartarus.org/~martin/PorterStemmer/</linkUri></externalLink> and removes English <externalLink><linkText>stop words</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stop_words</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: It removes possessives (trailing 's) from words, applies stemming as per <externalLink><linkText>Porter Stemming algorithm</linkText><linkUri>http://tartarus.org/~martin/PorterStemmer/</linkUri></externalLink> and removes English <externalLink><linkText>stop words</linkText><linkUri>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stop_words</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The analyzer can be configured independently for each field in the index definition by setting the <codeInline>analyzer</codeInline> property.
trans-unit.target: The analyzer can be configured independently for each field in the index definition by setting the <codeInline>analyzer</codeInline> property.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have separate fields for English, French, and Spanish hotel descriptions that exist side-by-side in the same index.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can have separate fields for English, French, and Spanish hotel descriptions that exist side-by-side in the same index.

trans-unit.source: The query specifies which language-specific field to return in your search queries.
trans-unit.target: The query specifies which language-specific field to return in your search queries.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search API)</link> for details on how to specify the language analyzer on a field in the index.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="ecafed05-c746-4d9e-ac8e-653066e909b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create Index (Azure Search API)</link> for details on how to specify the language analyzer on a field in the index.

trans-unit.source: Azure Search is previewing support for Microsoft's natural language processors in <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Service REST API Version 2015-02-28-Preview</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-api-2015-02-28-preview#LanguageSupport/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search is previewing support for Microsoft's natural language processors in <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Service REST API Version 2015-02-28-Preview</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-api-2015-02-28-preview#LanguageSupport/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: It is not currently available in the .NET library.
trans-unit.target: It is not currently available in the .NET library.

trans-unit.source: This feature adds support for more than 50 languages—with the same technology used by Microsoft Office and Bing, built on our many years of experience with natural language processing (NLP).
trans-unit.target: This feature adds support for more than 50 languages—with the same technology used by Microsoft Office and Bing, built on our many years of experience with natural language processing (NLP).

trans-unit.source: The NLP stack provides another choice for handling languages including a deep understanding of the unique differences across each of the supported languages.
trans-unit.target: The NLP stack provides another choice for handling languages including a deep understanding of the unique differences across each of the supported languages.

trans-unit.source: Below is the list of supported analyzers together with a short description of their features:
trans-unit.target: Below is the list of supported analyzers together with a short description of their features:

trans-unit.source: Uses probabilistic knowledge models to find the optimal word segmentation
trans-unit.target: Uses probabilistic knowledge models to find the optimal word segmentation

trans-unit.source: Indexes bigrams (overlapping groups of two adjacent Chinese characters)
trans-unit.target: Indexes bigrams (overlapping groups of two adjacent Chinese characters)

trans-unit.source: Removes some differences in spelling variations
trans-unit.target: Removes some differences in spelling variations

trans-unit.source: Normalizes the Unicode representation of text in Indian languages
trans-unit.target: Normalizes the Unicode representation of text in Indian languages

trans-unit.source: Lemmatization - reduces inflected adjectives and verbs to their base form
trans-unit.target: Lemmatization - reduces inflected adjectives and verbs to their base form

trans-unit.source: Indexes bigrams (overlapping groups of two adjacent Hangul characters)
trans-unit.target: Indexes bigrams (overlapping groups of two adjacent Hangul characters)

trans-unit.source: Implements Arabic and Persian orthographic normalization
trans-unit.target: Implements Arabic and Persian orthographic normalization

trans-unit.source: Strips all characters after an apostrophe (including the apostrophe itself)
trans-unit.target: Strips all characters after an apostrophe (including the apostrophe itself)

trans-unit.source: Standard ASCII Folding (language agnostic analyzer configuration)
trans-unit.target: Standard ASCII Folding (language agnostic analyzer configuration)

trans-unit.source: ASCII folding filter: Converts Unicode characters that don't belong to the set of first 127 ASCII characters into their ASCII equivalents.
trans-unit.target: ASCII folding filter: Converts Unicode characters that don't belong to the set of first 127 ASCII characters into their ASCII equivalents.

trans-unit.source: All analyzers with names annotated with <languageKeyword>lucene</languageKeyword> are powered by <externalLink><linkText>Apache Lucene's language analyzers</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/overview-summary.html</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All analyzers with names annotated with <languageKeyword>lucene</languageKeyword> are powered by <externalLink><linkText>Apache Lucene's language analyzers</linkText><linkUri>http://lucene.apache.org/core/4_9_0/analyzers-common/overview-summary.html</linkUri></externalLink>.
